itemInfo.itemDesc: An ingredient that can be sold to a Trader or used in Cooking. It can be obtained through Fishing.\n- Usage: Seafood Pasta, Stir Fried Seafood, Seafood Mushroom Salad, etc.

item.name: Dried Crab
item.desc: A dried crab obtained through Drying. It can be Crafted into a Trade Item at a Workbench.\nâ€» Drying decreases the value of the fish.
